entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Magog
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:43 a.m. EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Freezing rain. High zero.
entry.summary: Freezing rain except rain over southern sections. Risk of a thundershower. Rainfall amount 15 mm over southern sections. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High zero. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning.
